title: Amy’s Daughter Picks Interesting Song Choice For Her School Play Audition + 'Will It Pizza?' With Lunchbox + Most Memorable Jingle Game!
itunes:title: Amy’s Daughter Picks Interesting Song Choice For Her School Play Audition + 'Will It Pizza?' With Lunchbox + Most Memorable Jingle Game!
description:
Amy’s daughter is going to audition for a school play and Amy wants to know if her song choice is appropriate or not. Lunchbox. We tried out a new game called “Will It Pizza” to see if a restaurant would cook Lunchbox’s frozen pizza from the grocery store. Amy tries to win a caller a prize in the Most Memorable Jingle game. She tries to go 18/20 by naming the company that matches the jingle.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
